text: The Fiat Seicento is a car produced by Fiat. It replaced the Fiat Cinquecento in 1998 and like its predecessor is produced in Poland. Sales of it in the UK ran until early 2004 when it was replaced with the second-generation Panda. It was replaced by the new Fiat 500 in 2007, but production of the Seicento continues until 2010. == Models and engines == === 899 cc petrol engine, 29 kW (40 hp) === * S * SX * Young * Citymatic === 1108 cc petrol engine, 40 kW (54 hp) === * Sole * Sound * Suite * Hobby * Brush * Sporting === Electrical engine, 30 kW (41 hp) === * Elettra Seicento Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Fiat Seicento
